# RBE 2001
# HW 3

${\omega_{2}} = 4 rad/sec$

![](images/2001HW3.png)

1. ${V_{A}}$ in inches/sec

	${V_{A}} = (A{O_{2}}){\omega_{2}}$

	${V_{A}} = (5 in) * (4 rad/sec) = 20.000 inches/sec$

2. ${\omega_{3}}$ in rad/sec

	${\omega_{3}} = {V_{A}}/ A{I_{1, 3}}$

	${\omega_{3}} = 20/3.590 = 5.571 rad/sec$

3. ${V_{B}}$ in inches/ sec

   	${V_{B}} = (B{I_{1, 3}}){\omega_{3}}$

	${V_{B}} = (6.375)*(5.571) = 35.515 inches/sec$

4. ${\omega_{4}}$ in rad/sec

   	${\omega_{4}} = {V_{B}}/B{O_{4}}$

	${\omega_{4}} = 35.515/3 = 11.838 rad/sec$

5. ${V_{C}}$ in inches/sec

   	${V_{C}} = (C{I_{1, 3}}){\omega_{3}}$
	
	${V_{C}} = (2.854)*(5.571) = 15.899 inches/sec$
